My Resume

Profile

Professional Web Development, UI Design, Graphic Design, Project management, and IT Hardware and Software troubleshooting. Leading the design, branding and marketing efforts for several global businesses and have recruited and managed a team of supporting designers and developers for a wide range of clients. My experience includes development and implementation of technology strategies for website design, interactive media creation, e­Commerce websites, SEO strategies, web development and programming and IT Infrastructure and troubleshooting.

Employment History
